titles.title: PureTone
titles.premium: Crisp neutral interior paint with brilliant clarity and balance.
titles.title2: Great for clean, open interiors with architectural definition.

product_overview: PureTone enhances clarity and light balance for elegant, minimal, and neutral-themed interiors.
short_description: High-clarity, stain-resistant acrylic emulsion with design-grade finish and superior washability.
positioning: Fine pigment suspension | Balanced warmth and light

features_benefits.benefit: Covers uneven base coats in fewer layers
Ideal for areas needing frequent cleaning
Water-based and low-VOC formulation reduces environmental impact
Professional sheen with high clarity and balance

recommended_use.intro: Best for clean, open-plan interiors and minimal-themed spaces

application_system.label: Surface Prep
application_system.purpose: Ensure surface is clean, dry, and dust-free

recommended_substrates.description: Ideal for interior walls with even surface
Best applied with roller for even finish

surface_preparation: Remove all dust, grease, and loose material
Fill holes or cracks with suitable filler
Sand and clean prior to painting
application: Apply evenly with roller or spray
Apply second coat only after surface is dry
storage_safety: Store in cool, dry area away from direct sunlight

safety_first_aid.General: Avoid contact with skin and eyes
safety_first_aid.Skin Contact: Wash thoroughly with soap and water
safety_first_aid.Eye Contact: Rinse with plenty of water; seek medical advice if irritation persists
safety_first_aid.Ingestion: Do not induce vomiting; seek medical attention
safety_first_aid.Ventilation: Ensure adequate air circulation during application
safety_first_aid.Waste Disposal: Dispose as per local regulations for water-based paints

environmental_commitment: Formulated with low VOCs and no added solvents to support a healthier indoor environment and reduce emissions.

specs_summary.application_instructions: Apply evenly with brush, roller, or spray on clean surface
specs_summary.preparation_instructions: Clean and remove all loose material before application
specs_summary.storage_instructions: Store in cool area; do not freeze
